reviewText: This is a terrible movie and the DVD quality is also awful.  It's obviously another wide screen film being shown in full screen format by peddlers who have no respect for film or their customers.  Save your money.

I'd heard so much about this movie over the years, including the link to Magnificent Seven and the Japanese film M S is based on.
Disappointment reigned whilst watching.
movie was good story line the quality and sound was fairly good seeing the movie was made 50 years ago

One of my favorites from the past. I'd recommend this movie to anyone who likes this kind of movie!
Thanks Again!

01/07/12

  I received the movie in a timely fashion and in good condition. The movie was just fine. It is now part of my permanent collection.
